attributes.action: Grant independence to Meadpwpark Street in Glasgow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Long have the residents of Meadowpark Street in Glasgow been informally seen as an independent communist state. We the undersigned would like to see Meadowpark street formally take it's rightful place in the international community.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
